item.title: Tahir add a quote by AHMED FARAAZ
item.description: "aqal k andhon main chup hay faraaz kitni sayani is pagal ki batain hain" -- AHMED FARAAZ

item.title: Tahir add a quote by Barack Obama
item.description: "We don't ask you to believe in our ability to bring change, rather, we ask you to believe in yours." -- Barack Obama

item.title: Tahir add a quote by Farooq Sattar
item.description: "We want to make our land, a land of opportunity, rather, a land of opportunists." -- Farooq Sattar

item.title: Tahir add a quote by Vittorio Alfieri
item.description: "Often the test of courage becomes rather to live than to die." -- Vittorio Alfieri

item.title: Tahir add a quote by John William Kaye
item.description: "We cannot rein wild horses with silken braids." -- John William Kaye

item.title: Tahir add a quote by Sidney Sheldon
item.description: "When they die no one will ever know that once they lived." -- Sidney Sheldon

item.title: Tahir add a quote by sidney sheldon
item.description: "Life is like a novel. It's filled with suspense. You have no idea what is going to happen until you turn the page." -- sidney sheldon

item.title: Tahir add a quote by Benazir Bhutto
item.description: "Democracy is the best revenge." -- Benazir Bhutto

item.title: Tahir add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Discretion is the better part of valor." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Tahir add a quote by Muhammad Ali Jinnah
item.description: "Think 100 times before you take a decision, But once that decision is taken, stand by it as one man." -- Muhammad Ali Jinnah

item.title: Tahir add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Tahir add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Be not afraid of greatness. Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and others have greatness thrust upon them." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Tahir add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Tahir add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind, And therefore is winged Cupid painted blind." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Tahir add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "If music be the food of love, play on, Give me excess of it; that surfeiting, The appetite may sicken, and so die." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Tahir add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "This above all: to thine own self be true, And it must follow, as the night the day, Thou canst not then be false to any man." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Tahir add a quote by William Shakespeare
Tahir add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Tahir add a quote by William Shakespeare
Tahir add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "My bounty is as boundless as the sea, My love as deep; the more I give to thee, The more I have, for both are infinite." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Tahir add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "My tongue will tell the anger of my heart, or else my heart concealing it will break." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Tahir add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description:
"I am a Jew. Hath not a Jew eyes? Hath not a Jew hands, organs, dimensions, senses, affections, passions; fed with the same food, hurt with the same weapons, subject to the same diseases, heal'd by the same means, warm'd and cool'd by the same winter and summer, as a Christian is?
If you prick us, do we not bleed? If you tickle us, do we not laugh? If you poison us, do we not die?
And if you wrong us, do we not revenge? If we are like you in the rest, we will resemble you in that." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Tahir add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "We know what we are, but not what we may be." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Tahir add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "To weep is to make less the depth of grief." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Tahir add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Brevity is the soul of wit." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Tahir add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Conscience doth make cowards of us all." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Tahir add a quote by William Shakespear
item.description: "There is nothing either good or bad, but thinking makes it so." -- William Shakespear

item.title: Tahir add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Why, man, he doth bestride the narrow world Like a Colossus; and we petty men Walk under his huge legs, and peep about To find ourselves dishonourable graves." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Tahir add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Tahir add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure." -- J.K. Rowling
